name: Soko-Space
description:
Soko-Space is a Sokoban game set on-board a spaceship. Use the arrow keys to move and push the crates to there 'home' zones. Swipe with a mouse or your finger if on a mobile.

There are 10 levels at the moment. I may  make more and add other features if anyone seems interested!

The game is made using Phaser JS.

IOS: click to finish loading

Know issues,:clicking outside the game area will lose focus. Reload page-sorry!
